        Parameters:

      • otpCheck

        public static boolean otpCheck(int otp,
                               java.lang.String username)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to check the OTP is correct or not.
        Parameters:
        username - This parameter is the ID of the particular employee through which we can check the status.
        otp - This parameter is the OTP that is sent to the employee emailID.
        Returns:
        flag This will return the true or false.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This exception will be used on the Input error.

        public static int lines(java.lang.String filePath)

        This method is used to split the data in the file line wise to count the number of rows.

        Returns:
